Name: STAYHOMER
About the game: A large anti-lockdown movement is taking place in Tokyo! To prevent cluster infection, 'Disinfect' all anti-lockdown protesters! Walk around the city, and use the thermite grenade launcher to disinfect protesters. The time limit is 3 minutes. The achievement rate depends on how many people you disinfected in time. This game contains 3 endings, which are determined by the achievement rate. [User Guide] Move: W,A,S,D Run: Left Shift Jump: Space Look: Mouse movement Aim: Hold Right click Shoot: Left click Pause Menu: Esc * There is no problem in monetizing the play video or streaming of this game.
